casebody.data:
GOOD HOPE
v.
NCDHHS. No. 58A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 25, 2006. Susan M. Fradenburg, Greensboro, William W. Stewart, Jr., Raleigh, for Good Hope Health System. C. Winston Gilchrist, Lillington, for Town of Lillington. Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Marcus Lodge, for NCDHHS. Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Wallace C. Hollowell, III, Benjamin N. Thompson, K. Edward Greene, Kathleen A. Naggs, Raleigh, Denise M. Gunter, Winston-Salem, for Betsy Johnson Regional Hosp. S. Todd Hemphill, Diane E. Ricketts, Raleigh, for Amisub of NC. Forrest W. Campbell, Jr., for NC Hospital Asso.

The following order has been entered on the consent motion filed on the 24th day of July 2006 by Petitioners and Petitioner Intervenors for Extension of Time until August 15, 2006 to Respond to Respondent-Intervenor-Appellees' Motion to Dismiss and Motion to Take Judicial Notice:

*297"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of July 2006."
